kreport.name: areaForecloseRate_zp

condition.name: earea
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='区域' and d.dvalue in (${s@user_areas}) and d.dvalue>=20 and d.dvalue<800 order by d.ordernum

data.tbody: ${0} ${1} ${2} ${3} ${4} ${5} ${6} ${7} ${8}

kreport.ksql: select 处理区域, 工单编号, 工单标题, 报障时间, 报障人, 报障部门, 区域, 故障描述 from sys_data_dictionary d, ( --转IT中心工单清单 select 处理区域, 工单编号, f.title 工单标题, to_char(f.gendate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') 报障时间, i.organiger 报障人, i.organigerdept 报障部门, rend(i.area) 区域, i.faultdescription 故障描述 --分部转IT中心工单 select substr(n.executergrouporgname,1,2) 处理区域, f.serialno 工单编号, f.title 工单标题, to_char(f.gendate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') 报障时间, i.organiger 报障人, i.organigerdept 报障部门, rend(i.area) 区域, i.faultdescription 故障描述 from rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i,rec_node n,rec_node n2 where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and n.flowlsh=f.flowlsh and n2.flowlsh=f.flowlsh and f.status!='XJ' and n.nodecode='8705e3d30a112268006ecb0498438858' --IT分部接口 and n.status='YB' and n.nodelsh=n2.prenodelsh and n2.preroutecode='871605de0a1122680005e6411105e5d9' --转省IT中心协助 #[and f.startercode ${startercode}] #[and f.startercode=${type10000}] #[and f.gendate>=${startDate}] #[and f.gendate<${endDate}] #[and substr(n.executergrouporgname,1,2)=${areaname}] union --业支转IT中心工单 select substr(o2.org_name,1,2) 处理区域, f.serialno 工单编号, f.title 工单标题, to_char(f.gendate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') 报障时间, i.organiger 报障人, i.organigerdept 报障部门, rend(i.area) 区域, i.faultdescription 故障描述 from rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i,rec_node n,rec_node n2,sec_org o1,sec_org o2 where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and n.flowlsh=f.flowlsh and n2.flowlsh=f.flowlsh and f.status!='XJ' and n.nodecode='8706e7770a11226800104dac10cfa517' --业务支持中心接口 and n.status='YB' and n.nodelsh=n2.prenodelsh and n2.preroutecode='79ee8e340a112268004c0965a97dbc33' --转省IT中心协助 and o1.id=n.executergrouporgid and o2.org_code=substr(o1.org_code,1,8) #[and f.startercode ${startercode}] #[and f.startercode=${type10000}] #[and f.gendate>=${startDate}] #[and f.gendate<${endDate}] #[and substr(o2.org_name,1,2)=${areaname}] ) sl where d.dgroup='区域' and d.dname=sl.处理区域 #[and d.dvalue=${earea}] #[--${earea}]#[and d.dvalue in (${s@user_areas})]
